title: D-Day and the Liberation of Normandy
description: 1944’s hush-hush Allied plans to invade occupied France bring success, but hard fighting, as Hitler’s troops are well dug in in Normandy. With Jonathan Dimbleby.
itunes:subtitle: 1944’s hush-hush Allied plans to invade occupied France bring success.
itunes:summary: 1944’s hush-hush Allied plans to invade occupied France bring success, but hard fighting, as Hitler’s troops are well dug in in Normandy. With Jonathan Dimbleby.
itunes:author: BBC World Service
